inputFields.name: customMembersLabel
inputFields.description: What members of the group will be called. Can be at most 32 characters

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: Summary of what the Meetup group is about in simple HTML format

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Display name of the group. Can be at most 60 characters

inputFields.name: topics
inputFields.description: Sets the specified topics to the group overwriting any existing topics. Topics are identified by ids and can be obtained from find topics query

inputFields.name: urlname
inputFields.description: Name used for the group's web address on meetup.com. Must be between 6 and 60 characters
